value:
$WmMPID_クレイン,ch02_13_Klein_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Let me get this straight... We're
all here to prove which pair of
siblings is the most talented?$k$p$WmMPID_サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Indeed—this realm will be our
battlefield, apparently.$k$p$WmMPID_クレイン,ch02_13_Klein_M_Normal,Face|$w0|But why am I here? I'm not
your brother.$k$p$WmMPID_サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Nor I your sister, but...$k$pI am Sanaki, Empress of Begnion!
The Apostle! The voice of the
goddess!$k$pAnd what's more, I refuse to let any
other little sister prove herself of
greater standing than me.$k$pSo, to battle!$k$p$WmMPID_クレイン,ch02_13_Klein_M_Normal,Face|$w0|What have I gotten myself
into this time?$k

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You...you...beat us?$k$pWell, I suppose it's the right thing
to do to concede defeat.$k$pAfter all, it's not every day that
someone gets the best of me...
Sanaki, Empress of Begnion!$k$Sbs150|
